sentences.sentence: It was the deadliest medevac accident in Maryland in 40 years.
sentences.translation: 这是马里兰近40年来最严重的一起救伤直升机坠机事故。

sentences.sentence: It was the deadliest medevac accident to Maryland in forty years.
sentences.translation: 这是四十年里马里兰发生的最致命的救伤直升机事故。

sentences.sentence: Those medevac folks, between missions, had a lot of time on their hands.
sentences.translation: 那些救援人员们，在任务间歇，有很多的空闲时间。
